original_title: Il y a un dieu pour les ivrognes
overview: This film from George Melies is sadly one that's only available in fragments. The film starts off with a title card stating that a drunk man has just thrown his family out a window. We see a couple of them landing on the ground and then we go back to the room where the drunk is now trying to kill himself.
title: The Good Luck of a 'Souse'
